answers.answer: I think it's normal because that what i do hhh =D
That's exactly what I craved but I ended up getting gestational diabetes.  :'( I would just be careful and try to eat naturally sweet food.  Fruits!
Okay just making sure. This is baby number 2 and so much different than my first. I try to eat fruits however I get acid reflux really bad.
I had a problem with that too.  :( have you tried peppermint tea? That always helps me.  A friend of mine told me to try mentos for that too.  I haven't tried it yet but worth a shot?
I havent tried that but it is definitely worth a try :)
I'm the complete opposite. I lost my appetite. I'm 33 weeks.
I havent been able to eat my whole pregnancy. Now its like i never can get full
Omg same thing i been craving for ice cream everyday

31wks I wanted to eat everything in sight & most stuff that wasn't.  with a particular preference for anything cake, chocolate, cookies, crisps etc. Hubby thinks I just want foods beginning with C - no craving for carrots or cabbage though! Just junk. 33wks I don't want to eat anything anymore, no appetite.

question: I am 33 weeks and as of 3 days ago I cant stop eating. All I want is cookies and cakes. Pretty much anything unhealthy. Is this normal?
title: 33 weeks and cant stop eating??
